metadata.name: Golden Token: City 5 1/332
metadata.description: A Golden Token City 5 (GTC5) NFT provides the holder with a claim to mint a generative CryptoCitizen NFT IRL in City 5 (London, Paris, Amsterdam, Lisbon, or Dublin) in Summer 2022. City 5 will be voted on by CryptoCitizen holders in Spring 2022.
